    The New Eye, ThermoEye

    THERMOEYE, based on technology of temperature analysis, provides thermal imaging solution

    More Info

    ThermoSolution : Existing computer vision solution has focused on visible image. On the other hand, thermal image camera has had difficulty on applying to computer vision because it needed technical ability for analyzing and using thermal image. THERMOEYE develops not only the visual & thermal fusion image but also the thermal AI and data analyzing tools so that we can provide optimized solution to satisfy our customerâ€™s various purposes and needs.
